global.user-agreement: Please read the following user agreement and affirm that you agree to it

cookies.description:
We use cookies on this site to improve your experience.
By accepting, you agree to the use of cookies as described in our cookie policy.

authentication.unauthorized-page: You do not have permission to view that page.
authentication.password-reset-email-sent: A password reset email has been sent to the provided email address.
authentication.password-not-matching: Your passwords did not match or we could not find your password reset token

profile.name: Name
profile.confirm-delete-warning1: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
profile.organisation-category-label: Select the category that best describes your organization
profile.select-country: Select a country above to start adding states and provinces

onboarding.welcome-subheading: Please register with the platform. This is used to setup your account. All information provided is stored and used in accordance with the privacy policy found in the
onboarding.organization-not-listed-tip: If your organization is not listed in the dropdown, you can add a new one at this time. Select this checkbox, and on the next screen you can add details about your organization.
onboarding.user-agreement-desc: By checking here I affirm that I have read the User Agreement and agree to its terms.
onboarding.new-user-congratulations: Congratulations, your account has been created. Next, create a new initiative.
onboarding.initiative-intro: An Initiative is an area of improvement. Within that, you will select a specific Project, and you will see partners you can connect with on specific Requirements.
onboarding.lets-talk-about-you: Let's talk about what you do
onboarding.add-your-organization: Please take a moment to add your organization's service information below.
onboarding.select-eligible-initiatives: Select all of the ESG Initiatives you are eligible for
onboarding.select-initiative-timeline: Select your typical ESG project timeline
onboarding.client-types: What types of clients do you typically work with?
onboarding.tell-us-more-about-organization: Please, tell us more about your organization
onboarding.tell-us-more-about-organization-sub: Now, please tell us a little more about your organization so that our platform can help guide you to the most impactful initiatives and projects.
onboarding.thankyou-partners: Thank you for registering with DevvESG Platform
onboarding.application-under-review: Your application is under review. Please keep an eye on your email for an approval message and further instructions.
onboarding.we-are-glad: We are glad that you are here!
onboarding.tell-us-more: Now, please tell us a little more about your organization.
onboarding.if-organization-not-listed: If your organization is not listed in the dropdown, you can add a new one at this time. Select this checkbox, and you can add details about your organization.
onboarding.account-created-message: Congratulations, your account has been created.
onboarding.account-verify-message: Please verify your account by clicking the activation link that has been sent to your email.
onboarding.account-creation-notification: Your account has been Created successfuly, Please review and update.
onboarding.warn-wallet-session-in-active: Your wallet login is not active, You may not be able to perform some operations.

launchpad.analyse-description: Calculate your carbon footprint, determine your ESG score, and get insight into your organization's risk.
launchpad.improve-description: Reduce your impact by running guided initiatives and projects or by directly purchasing offset credits.
launchpad.report-description: Keep all of your internal and external stakeholders informed of your progress using custom or industry standard ESG reports and dashboards.
launchpad.carbon-footprint-answer: Carbon footprint is the gross tonnage of carbon emissions coming from your company either directly or indirectly. Carbon is the most talked about Greenhouse Gas (Gh-g) but not the only one that impacts our planet.
launchpad.initiative-answer: An initiative is a broad level undertaking to improve your environmental impact such as reducing your energy consumption. Inside of initiatives are projects which are more focused such as a solar energy project.
launchpad.marketplace-devvx-info: List, sell, and purchase credits in the fully integrated Glassblock Marketplace powered by Devvio.

analyse.already-known-impact-text: If you already know your CO₂ impact, enter here and take action to reduce it:
analyse.emissions-known-label: Average annual tons of CO₂ emissions (if known)
analyse.emissions-known-desc: Enter number of known tons of CO2 emissions
analyse.dont-know-carbon-impact-link: Don't know your carbon impact? Click here
analyse.carbon-impact-calculator-desc: Calculate your total Carbon Impact by entering all information below
analyse.electricity-form-label: Average annual energy usage in kWh (kilowatt per hour)
analyse.electricity-form-desc: Enter the number of kWh used per year
analyse.electricity-form-total-label: Carbon impact based on electricity usage in tCO₂ (tons carbon dioxide)
analyse.heat-form-oil-used-label: Average gallons of oil used per year
analyse.heat-form-oil-used-desc: Enter number of gallons of oil
analyse.heat-form-propane-used-label: Average gallons of propane used per year
analyse.heat-form-propane-used-desc: Enter number of gallons of propane
analyse.heat-form-natural-gas-used-label: Average cCF of natural gas used per year
analyse.heat-form-natural-gas-used-desc: Enter number of centum cubic feet of natural gas
analyse.heat-form-heating-usage-label: Carbon impact based on heating usage in tCO₂ (tons carbon dioxide)
analyse.vehicle-form-diesel-used-desc: Enter number of miles per gallons of diesel
analyse.vehicle-form-diesel-driven-label: Annual total miles driven using diesel
analyse.vehicle-form-gasoline-used-desc: Enter number of miles per gallons of gasoline
analyse.vehicle-form-gasoline-driven-label: Annual total miles driven using gasoline
analyse.vehicle-form-heating-usage-label: Carbon impact based on vehicle usage in tCO₂ (tons carbon dioxide)
analyse.vehicle-form-diesel-error: Fill out all diesel fields to add them to your footprint
analyse.vehicle-form-gasoline-error: Fill out all gasoline fields to add them to your footprint
analyse.air-form-travel-label: Average annual air travel in miles
analyse.air-form-travel-usage-label: Carbon impact based on air travel usage in tCO₂ (tons carbon dioxide)
analyse.rail-form-travel-label: Average annual rail travel in miles
analyse.rail-form-travel-usage-label: Carbon impact based on rail travel usage in tCO₂ (tons carbon dioxide)
analyse.shipping-form-air-number-label: Average annual number of shipments for air
analyse.shipping-form-air-weight-label: Average air shipment weight in pounds (lbs)
analyse.shipping-form-air-distance-label: Average air shipment distance in miles
analyse.shipping-form-ground-number-label: Average annual number of shipments for ground (truck)
analyse.shipping-form-ground-weight-label: Average ground shipment weight in pounds (lbs)
analyse.shipping-form-ground-distance-label: Average ground shipment distance in miles
analyse.shipping-form-ocean-number-label: Average annual number of shipments for ocean
analyse.shipping-form-ocean-weight-label: Average ocean shipment weight in pounds (lbs)
analyse.shipping-form-ocean-distance-label: Average ocean shipment distance in miles
analyse.shipping-form-total-label: Carbon impact based on shipping usage in tCO₂ (tons carbon dioxide)
analyse.shipping-form-air-error: Fill out all air fields to add them to your footprint
analyse.shipping-form-ground-error: Fill out all ground fields to add them to your footprint
analyse.shipping-form-ocean-error: Fill out all ocean fields to add them to your footprint
analyse.remove-footprint: Are you sure you want to remove this footprint?

improve.select-initiative: Select an initiative to add below
improve.reduce-impact-heading-b: tCO₂ by taking one of these actions:
improve.select-initiative-title: Select the ESG initiative you are interested in
improve.select-initiative-sub-title: Below are several initiatives that we have matched to you based on what your organization does, where it operates, and where you are in your journey. Please select an initiative below to explore projects you can undertake within that initiative.
improve.heading-a: Buy Credit Offsets from Our Marketplace
improve.upload-certification-pdf: Upload your certification pdf. from your device for review.
improve.submit-doc-desc: By submitting Credits document, your case will be reviewed by DevvESG. Continue?
improve.type-desc: The type of credit being created (i.e. carbon, plastic, REC)
improve.vintage-desc: The year of the credit creation.
improve.credit-count-desc: The number of credits to generate.
improve.project-description-desc: A short description of the project.
improve.project-activity-desc: A short description of the activity that generated these credits.
improve.geography-desc: A description of the geography or location where the project took place.
improve.location-desc: The coordinates in lat/long of where the project is located.
improve.project-id-desc: The project ID from the registry.
improve.project-batch-id-desc: The project batch ID from the registry.
improve.project-code-desc: The project code from the registry.
improve.project-ticker-desc: The project ticker from the registry.
improve.verifier-desc: The verification agency for the project.
improve.standard-desc: The standard used for the credit generation.
improve.methodology-desc: The methodology for the generation of the credit.
improve.project-type-desc: The program type that the project used for verifying the credits.
improve.registry-desc: The name of the registry for these credits.
improve.registry-link-desc: The URI to the credit listing in the registry.
improve.report-link-desc: The full report for this project can be found here.
improve.title: ESG Credits
improve.subtitle: See the status of your current ESG credits portfolio.

project.project-recommendations-desc: There are many ways that you can have impact on your initiative. Based on the information that you have provided us already the following are suggested projects that will have the most impact.
project.partner-recommendations-desc: The following are partners that are fully integrated with the DevvESG platform and suggested for use in your project.
project.send-connection-request-desc: This will send a connection request to this partner. They will be notified and can accept or decline your request.
project.file-desc: You may upload a .pdf, .doc, or .docx up to 5MB
project.launch-initiative: This looks a bit empty. Let's launch your initiative!
project.disconnect-partner: Are you sure you want to disconnect from the partner? This action cannot be undone
project.please-describe-reason: Please describe the reason you are disconnecting from this partner. 360 characters maximum

placeholder.project-validator: China Environmental United Certification Center Co., Ltd. (CEC)
placeholder.project-methodology: VM0018 developed and certified under the VCS program

warnings.province-required: At least one state or province required
warnings.password-pattern: Passwords must be at least 8 characters long, contain one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one symbol.
warnings.unsupported-image-format: Unsupported image format. Please use one of the following:
warnings.unsupported-doc-format: Unsupported document format. Please use one of the following:
warnings.not-all-province: Not all countries have states / provinces assigned
warnings.must-start-with: Must start with http:// or https://
warnings.start-date: Project start date must be less than project end date

admin.do-you-want-to-mint-this: Do you want to mint this?

admin.remove-user: Are you sure you want to remove this user?
admin.remove-vertical: Are you sure you want to remove this vertical?
admin.choose-date-to-retire-carbon-credits: Please choose a date and amount of credits to retire:
admin.retire-carbon-credits-confirmation: Credits can only be retired once. This cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
admin.mint-credits-confirmation: Credits once minted. This cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?

report.thankyou-for-requesting-report: Thank you for requesting your free ESG report. We're hard at work generating your company's profile and will be emailing your report to you soon.
report.did-you-know-that-majority: Did you know that the majority of your greenhouse gas emissions come from “Scope 3” impacts - those from your value chain and those working for your organization? Good news! You can use DevvESG to directly engage your employees or citizens on an individual level by creating an initiative and project with DevvESG Projects. When you're ready to get serious click below.

partner.requirement-information-desc: Review the requirement information and accept or decline the connection request
partner.by-accepting-this-connection: By accepting this connection, this becomes a registered deal in the DevvESG platform and is covered under your
partner.requests-desc: See your open connection requests from clients who want to work with you on a requirement. Review a request to accept or decline.
partner.no-documents-attached: There are no documents attached to this requirement.
partner.remove-document: Are you sure you want to remove this document?
partner.lets-get-started-desc: This looks a bit empty. Worry not! Let's head to requests.

terms-of-service.heading: DevvESG Terms of Service
terms-of-service.sub-heading: Thank you for using the DevvESG Platform. Please read this Terms of Service agreement carefully before accessing or using DevvESG. Because it is such an important contract between us and our users, we have tried to make it as clear as possible. For your convenience, we have presented these terms in a short non-binding summary followed by the full legal terms.
terms-of-service.definitions-desc: Some basic terms, defined in a way that will help you understand this agreement.
terms-of-service.account-terms-desc: These are the basic requirements of having an Account on DevvESG.
terms-of-service.acceptable-use-desc: These are the basic rules you must follow when using your DevvESG Account.
terms-of-service.copyright-desc: This section talks about how DevvESG will respond if you believe someone is infringing your copyrights on DevvESG.
terms-of-service.intellectual-property-notice-desc: This describes DevvESG's rights in the website and service.
terms-of-service.api-terms-desc: These are the rules for using DevvESG's APIs, whether you are using the API for development or data collection.
terms-of-service.additional-product-terms-desc: We have a few specific rules for DevvESG's features and products.
terms-of-service.beta-previews-desc: These are some of the additional terms that apply to DevvESG's features that are still in development.
terms-of-service.payment-desc: You are responsible for payment. We are responsible for billing you accurately.
terms-of-service.cancellation-and-termination-desc: You may cancel this agreement and close your Account at any time.
terms-of-service.communications-with-devvesg-desc: We only use email and other electronic means to stay in touch with our users. We do not provide phone support.
terms-of-service.publicity-desc: We may use your logo and name in communication of users of the platform. We shall not use your name or logo to imply that you own or endorses any DevvESG product or service, other than communicating that you are a user of the Platform.
terms-of-service.disclaimer-of-warranties-desc: We provide our service as is, and we make no promises or guarantees about this service. Please read this section carefully; you should understand what to expect.
terms-of-service.limitation-of-liability-desc: We will not be liable for damages or losses arising from your use or inability to use the service or otherwise arising under this agreement. Please read this section carefully; it limits our obligations to you.
terms-of-service.release-and-indemnification-desc: You are fully responsible for your use of the service.
terms-of-service.changes-to-terms: Changes to these Terms of Service
terms-of-service.changes-to-terms-desc: We may modify this agreement, but we will give you 30 days' notice of material changes.
terms-of-service.miscellaneous-desc: Please see this section for legal details including our choice of law.
terms-of-service.summary-desc: Summary. These terms are used throughout the agreement, and they have the meanings below.
terms-of-service.account-desc: Account. Your legal relationship with DevvESG and Devvio, Inc.
terms-of-service.user-account-desc: User Account. An individual User's authorization to log in to and use the Service, and the User's identity on the DevvESG systems.
terms-of-service.organizations-desc: Organizations. Shared workspaces that may be associated with a single entity or with one or more Users where multiple Users can collaborate across many projects at once. A User Account can be a member of any number of Organizations.
terms-of-service.agreement-desc: Agreement. All the terms, conditions, notices contained or referenced in this document (the 'Terms of Service' or the 'Terms') and all other operating rules, policies (including the DevvESG Privacy Statement, available at <1>https://www.devvesg.com/policies) and procedures that we may publish from time to time on the Website. Most of our site policies are available at <1>https://www.devvesg.com/policies.
terms-of-service.beta-previews-detail-desc: Beta Preview. Software, services, or features identified as alpha, beta, preview, early access, or evaluation, or words or phrases with similar meanings.
terms-of-service.content-desc: Content. Content featured or displayed through the Website, including without limitation code, text, data, articles, images, photographs, graphics, software, applications, packages, designs, features, and other materials that are available on the Website or otherwise available through the Service. Content also includes Services.
terms-of-service.user-generated-content-desc: User-Generated Content. Content, written or otherwise, created or uploaded by our Users.
terms-of-service.your-content-desc: Your Content. Content that you create or own.
terms-of-service.project-desc: Project. An activity, for example an energy conservation upgrade to a facility, that is facilitated by DevvESG's Website.
terms-of-service.devvesg-desc: DevvESG, We, and Us. Devvio, Inc., as well as our affiliates, directors, subsidiaries, contractors, licensors, officers, agents, and employees.
terms-of-service.service-desc: Service. The applications, software, products, and services provided by DevvESG, including the Platform and any Beta Previews.
terms-of-service.service-desc-sub: The User, You, and Your. The individual person, company, or organization that has visited or is using the Website or Service; that accesses or uses any part of the Account; or that directs the use of the Account in the performance of its functions. A User must be at least 13 years of age. Special terms may apply for business or government Accounts (See <1>Additional Terms).
terms-of-service.service-provider-desc: Service Providers. Parties other than You and DevvESG whose identity, brand name, or contact information is communicated to you via the Website.
terms-of-service.website-desc: Website. DevvESG's website located at <1>https://www.devvesg.com, and all content, services, and products provided by DevvESG at or through the Website. It also refers to DevvESG-owned subdomains of devvesg.com. Websites owned by DevvESG may provide different or additional terms of service. If those additional terms conflict with this Agreement, the more specific terms apply to the relevant page or service.
terms-of-service.platform-desc: Platform. DevvESG's online system that allows users to store information and record transactions concerning such information via a variety of services. The Platform facilitates connections between companies, and information storage and business transactions related to projects such as energy and carbon reduction projects. Users of the Platform can store and communicate information using the Platform.
terms-of-service.account-terms-detail-desc: Summary: User Accounts and Organizations have different administrative controls; a human must create your Account; you must be 13 or over; you must provide a valid email address; and you may not have more than one free Account. You alone are responsible for your Account and anything that happens while you are signed in to or using your Account. You are responsible for keeping your Account secure.
terms-of-service.account-controls-desc1: Users. Subject to these Terms, you retain ultimate administrative control over your User Account and the Content within it.
terms-of-service.account-controls-desc2: Organizations. The "owner" of an Organization that was created under these Terms has ultimate administrative control over that Organization and the Content within it. Within the Service, an owner can manage User access to the Organization's data and projects. An Organization may have multiple owners, but there must be at least one User Account designated as an owner of an Organization. If you are the owner of an Organization under these Terms, we consider you responsible for the actions that are performed on or through that Organization.
terms-of-service.required-information-desc: You must provide the information requested in the signup process, including your real name and a valid email address. If you are accepting these terms on behalf of a legal entity we need more information about the legal entity. If you opt for a paid Account, additional information will be necessary for billing purposes. If you start any Projects, additional information about the Project will be required.
terms-of-service.account-requirements-desc1: You must be a human to create an Account. Accounts registered by "bots" or other automated methods are not permitted.
terms-of-service.account-requirements-desc2: One person or legal entity may maintain no more than one free Account (if you choose to control a machine account as well, that's fine, but it can only be used for running a machine).
terms-of-service.account-requirements-desc3: You must be age 13 or older. DevvESG does not target our Service to children under 13, and we do not permit any Users under 13 on our Service. If we learn of any User under the age of 13, we will terminate that User's Account immediately. If you are a resident of a country outside the United States, your country's minimum age may be older; in such a case, you are responsible for complying with your country's laws.
terms-of-service.account-requirements-desc4: Your login may only be used by one person — i.e., a single login may not be shared by multiple people. A paid Organization may only provide access to as many User Accounts as your subscription allows.
terms-of-service.account-requirements-desc5: You may not use DevvESG in violation of export control or sanctions laws of the United States or any other applicable jurisdiction. You may not use DevvESG if you are or are working on behalf of a Specially Designated National (SDN) or a person subject to similar blocking or denied party prohibitions administered by a U.S. government agency. DevvESG may allow persons in certain sanctioned countries or territories to access certain DevvESG services pursuant to U.S. government authorizations.
terms-of-service.user-account-security-desc1: You are responsible for keeping your Account secure while you use our Service. We offer tools such as two-factor authentication to help you maintain your Account's security, but the content of your Account and its security are up to you.
terms-of-service.user-account-security-desc2: You are responsible for all content posted and activity that occurs under your Account (even when content is posted by others who have Accounts under your Account).
terms-of-service.user-account-security-desc3: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your Account and password. DevvESG cannot and will not be liable for any loss or damage from your failure to comply with this security obligation.
terms-of-service.user-account-security-desc4: You will promptly notify DevvESG if you become aware of any unauthorized use of, or access to, our Service through your Account, including any unauthorized use of your password or Account.
terms-of-service.additional-terms-desc1: In some situations, third parties' terms may apply to your use of DevvESG. For example, you may be a member of an organization on DevvESG with its own terms or license agreements; you may download an application that integrates with DevvESG; or you may use DevvESG to authenticate to another service. Please be aware that while these Terms are our full agreement with you, other parties' terms govern their relationships with you.
terms-of-service.additional-terms-desc2: If you are a government User or otherwise accessing or using any DevvESG Service in a government capacity, this Government Amendment to DevvESG Terms of Service applies to you, and you agree to its provisions.
terms-of-service.acceptable-use-summary: Summary: While using the service, you must follow the terms of this section, which include some restrictions on content you can post, conduct on the service, and other limitations. In short, be good to each other and Users and Service Providers.
terms-of-service.acceptable-use-detail-desc1: Your use of the Website and Service must not violate any applicable laws, including copyright or trademark laws, export control or sanctions laws, or other laws in your jurisdiction. You are responsible for making sure that your use of the Service is in compliance with laws and any applicable regulations.
terms-of-service.acceptable-use-detail-desc2: You agree that you will not under any circumstances violate our Acceptable Use Policies.
terms-of-service.copyright-infringement-desc1: If you believe that content on our website violates your copyright, please contact us in accordance with our Digital Millennium Copyright Act Policy. If you are a copyright owner and you believe that content on DevvESG violates your rights, please contact us by emailing support@DevvESG.com. There may be legal consequences for sending a false or frivolous takedown notice. Before sending a takedown request, you must consider legal uses such as fair use and licensed uses.
terms-of-service.copyright-infringement-desc2: We will terminate the Accounts of repeat infringers of this policy.
terms-of-service.intellectual-property-notice-summary: Summary: We own the service and all of our content. In order for you to use our content, we give you certain rights to it, but you may only use our content in the way we have allowed.
terms-of-service.right-to-content-desc: DevvESG and our licensors, vendors, agents, content providers and Service Providers retain ownership of all intellectual property rights of any kind related to the Website and Service. We reserve all rights that are not expressly granted to you under this Agreement or by law. The look and feel of the Website and Service is copyright © Devvio, Inc. All rights reserved. You may not duplicate, copy, or reuse any portion of the HTML/CSS, Javascript, or visual design elements or concepts without express written permission from DevvESG.
terms-of-service.trademark-and-logos-desc: If you'd like to use DevvESG's trademarks, you must follow all of our trademark guidelines, including those on our logos page: <0>https://www.devvesg.com/branding</0>.
terms-of-service.api-terms-summry: Summary: You agree to these Terms of Service, plus this Section H, when using any of DevvESG's APIs (Application Provider Interface), including use of the API through a third party product that accesses DevvESG.
terms-of-service.api-terms-desc1: Abuse or excessively frequent requests to DevvESG via the API may result in the temporary or permanent suspension of your Account's access to the API. DevvESG, in our sole discretion, will determine abuse or excessive usage of the API. We will make a reasonable attempt to warn you via email prior to suspension.
terms-of-service.api-terms-desc2: You may not share API tokens to exceed DevvESG's rate limitations.
terms-of-service.api-terms-desc3: You may not use the API to download data or Content from DevvESG for spamming purposes, including for the purposes of selling DevvESG users' personal information, such as to recruiters, headhunters, and job boards.
terms-of-service.api-terms-desc4: All use of the DevvESG API is subject to these Terms of Service and the DevvESG Privacy Statement.
terms-of-service.api-terms-desc5: DevvESG may offer subscription-based access to our API for those Users who require high-throughput access or access that would result in resale of DevvESG's Service.
terms-of-service.additional-product-terms-summary: Summary: You need to follow certain specific terms and conditions for DevvESG's various features and products, and you agree to the Supplemental Terms and Conditions when you agree to this Agreement.
terms-of-service.additional-product-terms-desc1: Some Service features may be subject to additional terms specific to that feature or product as set forth in the DevvESG Additional Product Terms. By accessing or using the Services, you also agree to the DevvESG Additional Product Terms.
terms-of-service.beta-previews-summary: Summary: Beta Previews may not be supported or may change at any time. You may receive confidential information through those programs that must remain confidential while the program is private. We'd love your feedback to make our Beta Previews better.
terms-of-service.subject-to-change-desc: Beta Previews may not be supported and may be changed at any time without notice. In addition, Beta Previews are not subject to the same security measures and auditing to which the Service has been and is subject. By using a Beta Preview, you use it at your own risk.
terms-of-service.confidentiality-desc1: As a user of Beta Previews, you may get access to special information that isn't available to the rest of the world. Due to the sensitive nature of this information, it's important for us to make sure that you keep that information secret.
terms-of-service.confidentiality-desc2: Confidentiality Obligations. You agree that any non-public Beta Preview information we give you, such as information about a private Beta Preview, will be considered DevvESG's confidential information (collectively, “Confidential Information”), regardless of whether it is marked or identified as such. You agree to only use such Confidential Information for the express purpose of testing and evaluating the Beta Preview (the “Purpose”), and not for any other purpose. You should use the same degree of care as you would with your own confidential information, but no less than reasonable precautions to prevent any unauthorized use, disclosure, publication, or dissemination of our Confidential Information. You promise not to disclose, publish, or disseminate any Confidential Information to any third party, unless we don't otherwise prohibit or restrict such disclosure (for example, you might be part of a DevvESG -organized group discussion about a private Beta Preview feature).
terms-of-service.confidentiality-desc3: Exceptions. Confidential Information will not include information that is: (a) or becomes publicly available without breach of this Agreement through no act or inaction on your part (such as when a private Beta Preview becomes a public Beta Preview); (b) known to you before we disclose it to you; (c) independently developed by you without breach of any confidentiality obligation to us or any third party; or (d) disclosed with permission from DevvESG. You will not violate the terms of this Agreement if you are required to disclose Confidential Information pursuant to operation of law, provided DevvESG has been given reasonable advance written notice to object, unless prohibited by law.
terms-of-service.feedback-desc: We're always trying to improve of products and services, and your feedback as a Beta Preview user will help us do that. If you choose to give us any ideas, know-how, algorithms, code contributions, suggestions, enhancement requests, recommendations or any other feedback for our products or services (collectively, “Feedback”), you acknowledge and agree that DevvESG will have a royalty-free, fully paid-up, worldwide, transferable, sub-licensable, irrevocable and perpetual license to implement, use, modify, commercially exploit and/or incorporate the Feedback into our products, services, and documentation.
terms-of-service.payment-summary: Summary: You are responsible for any fees associated with your use of DevvESG. We are responsible for communicating those fees to you clearly and accurately, and letting you know well in advance if those prices change.
terms-of-service.pricing-desc1: Our pricing and payment terms are available at <0>https://www.devvesg.com/pricing</0>. If you agree to a subscription price, that will remain your price for the duration of the payment term; however, prices are subject to change at the end of a payment term.
terms-of-service.upgrades-desc1: We will immediately bill you when you upgrade from a free plan to any paying plan.
terms-of-service.upgrades-desc2: If you change from a monthly billing plan to a yearly billing plan, DevvESG will bill you for a full year at the next monthly billing date.
terms-of-service.upgrades-desc3: If you upgrade to a higher level of service, we will bill you for the upgraded plan immediately.
terms-of-service.upgrades-desc4: You may change your level of service at any time by choosing a plan option or going into your Billing settings. If you choose to downgrade your Account, you may lose access to Content, features, or capacity of your Account. Please see our section on Cancellation for information on getting a copy of that Content.
terms-of-service.billing-schedule-desc1: Payment Based on Plan For monthly or yearly payment plans, the Service is billed in advance on a monthly or yearly basis respectively and is non-refundable. There will be no refunds or credits for partial months of service, downgrade refunds, or refunds for months unused with an open Account; however, the service will remain active for the length of the paid billing period. In order to treat everyone equally, no exceptions will be made.
terms-of-service.billing-schedule-desc2: Payment Based on Usage Some Service features are billed based on your usage. A limited quantity of these Service features may be included in your plan for a limited term without additional charge. If you choose to purchase paid Service features beyond the quantity included in your plan, you pay for those Service features based on your actual usage in the preceding month. Monthly payment for these purchases will be charged on a periodic basis in arrears. See DevvESG Additional Product Terms for Details.
terms-of-service.billing-schedule-desc3: Invoicing For invoiced Users, User agrees to pay the fees in full, up front without deduction or setoff of any kind, in U.S. Dollars. User must pay the fees within thirty (30) days of the DevvESG invoice date. Amounts payable under this Agreement are non-refundable, except as otherwise provided in this Agreement. If User fails to pay any fees on time, DevvESG reserves the right, in addition to taking any other action at law or equity, to (i) charge interest on past due amounts at 1.0% per month or the highest interest rate allowed by law, whichever is less, and to charge all expenses of recovery, and (ii) terminate the applicable order form. User is solely responsible for all taxes, fees, duties and governmental assessments (except for taxes based on DevvESG's net income) that are imposed or become due in connection with this Agreement.
terms-of-service.authorization-desc: By agreeing to these Terms, you are giving us permission to charge your on-file credit card or other approved methods of payment for fees that you authorize for DevvESG.
terms-of-service.responsibility-for-payment-desc: You are responsible for all fees, including taxes, associated with your use of the Service. By using the Service, you agree to pay DevvESG any charge incurred in connection with your use of the Service. If you dispute the matter, contact DevvESG Support. You are responsible for providing us with a valid means of payment for paid Accounts. Free Accounts are not required to provide payment information.
terms-of-service.noncircumvention-desc: The Services may include introductions to Service Providers. DevvESG invests significantly in finding and developing relationships with Service Providers, and in matching Service Providers to Projects of interest to You. You agree not to pursue Projects or other related relationships or work with any Service Provider communicated to you by the Website or the Services while Your Account is active and for one year after any cancellation or termination of Your Account.
terms-of-service.cancellation-and-termination-summary: Summary: You may close your Account at any time. If you do, we'll treat your information responsibly.
terms-of-service.account-cancellation-desc: It is your responsibility to properly cancel your Account with DevvESG. You can cancel your Account at any time by going into your Settings in the global navigation bar at the top of the screen. The Account screen provides a simple, no questions asked cancellation link. We are not able to cancel Accounts in response to an email or phone request.
terms-of-service.upon-cancellation-desc1: We will retain and use your information as necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements, but barring legal requirements, we will delete your full profile and the Content of your repositories within 90 days of cancellation or termination (though some information may remain in encrypted backups). This information can not be recovered once your Account is cancelled.
terms-of-service.upon-cancellation-desc2: Upon request, we will make a reasonable effort to provide an Account owner with a copy of your lawful, non-infringing Account contents after Account cancellation, termination, or downgrade. You must make this request within 90 days of cancellation, termination, or downgrade.
terms-of-service.upon-cancellation-desc3: Your obligations to refrain from circumventing Our system for Projects and Service Providers shall continue for one year after cancellation.
terms-of-service.devvesg-may-terminate-desc: DevvESG has the right to suspend or terminate your access to all or any part of the Website at any time, with or without cause, with or without notice, effective immediately. DevvESG reserves the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason at any time.
terms-of-service.survival-desc: All provisions of this Agreement which, by their nature, should survive termination will survive termination — including, without limitation: ownership provisions, warranty disclaimers, indemnity, and limitations of liability.
terms-of-service.communications-with-devvesg-summary: Summary: We use email and other electronic means to stay in touch with our users.
terms-of-service.electronic-communication-required-desc: For contractual purposes, you (1) consent to receive communications from us in an electronic form via the email address you have submitted or via the Service; and (2) agree that all Terms of Service, agreements, notices, disclosures, and other communications that we provide to you electronically satisfy any legal requirement that those communications would satisfy if they were on paper. This section does not affect your non-waivable rights.
terms-of-service.legal-notice: Legal Notice to DevvESG Must Be in Writing
terms-of-service.legal-notice-desc: Communications made through email or DevvESG Support's messaging system will not constitute legal notice to DevvESG or any of its officers, employees, agents or representatives in any situation where notice to DevvESG is required by contract or any law or regulation. Legal notice to DevvESG must be in writing and served on DevvESG's legal agent.
terms-of-service.no-phone-support-desc: DevvESG only offers support via email, in-Service communications, and electronic messages. We do not offer telephone support.
terms-of-service.publicity-desc1: DevvESG shall have the right to use the User and User's Company name and logo in communicating to the public users of the Platform, without compensation to User or User's Company. DevvESG shall not use User or User's Company name or logo to imply that User or User's Company owns or endorses any Devvio product or service, other than communicating that User and User's Company is a user of the Platform.
terms-of-service.publicity-desc2: Vendor shall have the right to use Devvio's name and logo and the DevvESG logo in communicating to the public the User and User's Company uses the Platform, without compensation to DevvESG. Vendor shall not use Devvio's name or logo or the DevvESG logo to imply that DevvESG owns or endorses any User or User's Company product or service, other than communicating that User and User's Company is a user of the Platform.
terms-of-service.disclaimer-of-warranties-summary: Summary: We provide our service as is, and we make no promises or guarantees about this service. Please read this section carefully; you should understand what to expect.
terms-of-service.disclaimer-of-warranties-desc1: DevvESG provides the Website and the Service “as is” and “as available,” without warranty of any kind. Without limiting this, we expressly disclaim all warranties, whether express, implied or statutory, regarding the Website and the Service including without limitation any warranty of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, title, security, accuracy and non-infringement.
terms-of-service.disclaimer-of-warranties-desc2: DevvESG does not warrant that the Service will meet your requirements; that the Service will be uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error-free; that the information provided through the Service is accurate, reliable or correct; that any defects or errors will be corrected; that the Service will be available at any particular time or location; or that the Service is free of viruses or other harmful components. You assume full responsibility and risk of loss resulting from your downloading and/or use of files, information, content or other material obtained from the Service.
terms-of-service.disclaimer-of-warranties-desc3: The Website may present estimates and projections, e.g., relating to cost of products or services, tax credits or savings, and costs saved or other business effects. Such estimates and projections are DevvESG's estimates and projections only, and DevvESG does not warrant that the estimates and projections will apply to Your Project or You. DevvESG recommends that You determine exact amounts and effects from consultations with appropriate other parties.
terms-of-service.limitation-of-liability-summary: Summary: We will not be liable for damages or losses arising from your use or inability to use the service or otherwise arising under this agreement. Please read this section carefully; it limits our obligations to you.
terms-of-service.limitation-of-liability-desc1: You understand and agree that we will not be liable to you or any third party for any loss of profits, use, goodwill, or data, or for any incidental, indirect, special, consequential or exemplary damages, however arising, that result from
terms-of-service.limitation-of-liability-desc2: your use or inability to use the Service
terms-of-service.limitation-of-liability-desc3: any modification, price change, suspension or discontinuance of the Service
terms-of-service.limitation-of-liability-desc4: the Service generally or the software or systems that make the Service available
terms-of-service.limitation-of-liability-desc5: unauthorized access to or alterations of your transmissions or data
terms-of-service.limitation-of-liability-desc6: statements or conduct of any third party on the Service
terms-of-service.limitation-of-liability-desc7: any other user interactions that you input or receive through your use of the Service
terms-of-service.limitation-of-liability-desc8: interactions, agreements, or work with any Service Provider; or
terms-of-service.limitation-of-liability-desc9: any other matter relating to the Service
terms-of-service.limitation-of-liability-desc10: Our liability is limited whether or not we have been informed of the possibility of such damages, and even if a remedy set forth in this Agreement is found to have failed of its essential purpose. We will have no liability for any failure or delay due to matters beyond our reasonable control
terms-of-service.release-and-indemnification-summary: Summary: You are responsible for your use of the service. If you harm someone else or get into a dispute with someone else, we will not be involved
terms-of-service.release-and-indemnification-desc1: If you have a dispute with one or more Users or Service Providers, you agree to release DevvESG from any and all claims, demands and damages (actual and consequential) of every kind and nature, known and unknown, arising out of or in any way connected with such disputes
terms-of-service.release-and-indemnification-desc2: You agree to indemnify us, defend us, and hold us harmless from and against any and all claims, liabilities, and expenses, including attorneys' fees, arising out of your use of the Website and the Service, including but not limited to your violation of this Agreement, provided that DevvESG (1) promptly gives you written notice of the claim, demand, suit or proceeding; (2) gives you sole control of the defense and settlement of the claim, demand, suit or proceeding (provided that you may not settle any claim, demand, suit or proceeding unless the settlement unconditionally releases DevvESG of all liability); and (3) provides to you all reasonable assistance, at your expense.
terms-of-service.changes-to-terms-desc1: Summary: We may modify this agreement at any time, we will notify users of any material changes and give you time to adjust to them.
terms-of-service.changes-to-terms-desc2: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to amend these Terms of Service at any time and will update these Terms of Service in the event of any such amendments. We will notify our Users of material changes to this Agreement, such as price increases, at least 30 days prior to the change taking effect by posting a notice on our Website or sending email to the primary email address specified in your DevvESG account. Customer's continued use of the Service after those 30 days constitutes agreement to those revisions of this Agreement. For any other modifications, your continued use of the Website constitutes agreement to our revisions of these Terms of Service. You can view all changes to these Terms in our Site Policy repository.
terms-of-service.changes-to-terms-desc3: We reserve the right at any time and from time to time to modify or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, the Website (or any part of it) with or without notice.
terms-of-service.governing-law-desc: Except to the extent applicable law provides otherwise, this Agreement between you and DevvESG and any access to or use of the Website or the Service are governed by the federal laws of the United States of America and the laws of the State of New Mexico, without regard to conflict of law provisions. You and DevvESG agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction and venue of the courts located in the State of New Mexico.
terms-of-service.non-assignability-desc: DevvESG may assign or delegate these Terms of Service and/or the DevvESG Privacy Statement, in whole or in part, to any person or entity at any time with or without your consent, including the license grant in Section 4. You may not assign or delegate any rights or obligations under the Terms of Service or Privacy Statement without our prior written consent, and any unauthorized assignment and delegation by you is void.
terms-of-service.section-headings-and-summaries-desc: Throughout this Agreement, each section includes titles and brief summaries of the following terms and conditions. These section titles and brief summaries are not legally binding.
terms-of-service.severability-no-waiver-desc: If any part of this Agreement is held invalid or unenforceable, that portion of the Agreement will be construed to reflect the parties' original intent. The remaining portions will remain in full force and effect. Any failure on the part of DevvESG to enforce any provision of this Agreement will not be considered a waiver of our right to enforce such provision. Our rights under this Agreement will survive any termination of this Agreement.
terms-of-service.amendments-complete-agreement-desc: This Agreement may only be modified by a written amendment signed by an authorized representative of DevvESG, or by the posting by DevvESG of a revised version in accordance with this Agreement. Changes to These Terms. These Terms of Service, together with the DevvESG Privacy Statement, represent the complete and exclusive statement of the agreement between you and us. This Agreement supersedes any proposal or prior agreement oral or written, and any other communications between you and DevvESG relating to the subject matter of these terms including any confidentiality or nondisclosure agreements.

questionnaire.take-questionnaire: Take the questionnaire to determine your ESG score.
questionnaire.question: Question
questionnaire.not-completed-disclaimer: You have not attempted all the questions, If you submit it will affect your score.
questionnaire.completed-disclaimer: Are you sure you want to submit it? If you submit you will not be able to edit it again
questionnaire.no-history: History is only a representation of your questionnaire attempts, complete one to see something being written here.
questionnaire.secret-getting-started: The secret to getting ahead is getting started
questionnaire.click-get-started: To calculate your ESG Score get started now.
questionnaire.see-scores-improving: See how your scores are improving
questionnaire.individual-scores: Your individual Environment, Social, and Governance scores.
questionnaire.scores-disclaimer: These scores were derived from industry standards and academic formulas designed to measure the impact of organizations in your peer group.
questionnaire.view-previous-responses: View your previous responses to the questionnaire

invalid-password: Invalid password or passwords do not match
not-logged-in: You are not currently logged in
not-allowed: You are not allowed to perform this action
request-could-not-be-processed: Your request could not be processed
incorrect-credentials: Your username or password was incorrect or does not exist. Please try again.
password-update-failed: Update password failed. Make sure your current password is correct.
invalid-combination: Invalid combination of user type and client or partner association
email-already-exist: A user with that e-mail address is already registered in the system.
nft-sold-to-marketplace: Nft has been sold to marketplace
failed-to-sold-nft: Failed to sale nft on marketplace
devvio-login-failed: DEVVIO login failed with the s/a used.

wallet.create-wallet-server-error: Your wallet creation is failed due to server issue
wallet.email-not-verified: Your Wallet email verification is pending.
